commands.reset: Reset the bot to default settings (Wipes bot data!).
commands.topxp: Display a table containing users with the most XP and level they current are.
commands.topcoins: Display a table containing users with the highest number of coins.
commands.toprep: Display a table containing users with the highest reputation.
commands.setxp: Sets the XP of a user (Restricted).
commands.setrep: Sets the reputation of a user (Restricted).
commands.setcoins: Sets the coins of a user (Restricted).
commands.play: Spend coins to TTS a custom provided message.
commands.about: Display the about information for this bot.
commands.getxp: Get the current XP and level of a user (Self).
commands.getrep: Get the current reputation of a user (Self).
commands.getfilters: Get the list of reputation filter words
commands.statistics: Displays the general statistics of Niscoin.
